programme.title: UK National Anthem
programme.desc: “God Save the King” is broadcast each morning at 0559 on GB News – Britain's News Channel.

programme.title: The valley rebels
programme.desc: Cédric Herrou is a farmer who supports and houses African refugees in the alpine village of Breil-Sur-Roya in southern France. Some regard him as a heroic good samaritan, but others – including the French border police and state prosecutor – denounce him as the leader of a band of smugglers, bringing migrants from Italy into France while flouting official border controls. As Cedric moves from one prosecution to another, why do he and his fellow activists feel compelled to defy the authorities?

programme.title: Autism rocks: meet the boys from The AutistiX | What it's like to find out you're autistic aged 33
programme.desc: Autism rocks: meet the boys from The AutistiX | What it's like to find out you're autistic aged 33

programme.title: Untold Chaos: Living through Libya's wars
programme.desc: At the end of his US presidency, Barack Obama said his worst mistake was failing to plan for the day after the intervention in Libya. What followed was chaos. Filmed over seven years, this is an observational mosaic, capturing the feeling of a country in the hands of warlords and a proxy war, while a divided political process and a fragile international peace deal loom.

programme.title: Someone Else's War
programme.desc: To date at least 20 British nationals, some with no previous experience of combat, have travelled to Syria to fight Isis on the frontline. Eight of these Brits have lost their lives. This film follows the journeys of parents as they investigate why their children went to join the Kurdish army in their fight against Isis. What led these young Brits to risk everything, travelling thousands of miles from home to wage war against the world's most feared terrorist organisation?

programme.title: How to make a pearl
programme.desc: For 53 years, John Kapellas enjoyed the bright sky of the western US, but one day he started to burn, blister and break out in rashes whenever he was exposed to light. Now allergic to the entire spectrum of light, Kapellas has spent the last decade living in complete darkness. When one of the side effects of the drugs John was prescribed made him ‘go nuts', he started drawing large abstract pictures on his walls and playing the piano to calm his mind and soothe the pain.

programme.title: La caravana: On the road with the migrant caravan
programme.desc: Thousands of migrants from Honduras, El Salvador and Guatemala head north hoping to find work and a better life in the US. The largest Central American caravan in decades keeps growing as thousands more join this journey – but when they reach Mexico, the migrant caravan starts taking different directions.

programme.title: Killing Gävle
programme.desc: In the small city of Gävle, northern Sweden, there is an annual fight between local custodians and mischievous pagans for the spirit of Christmas. Each year since 1966, business owners have paid for a 13-metre (40ft) effigy of a goat to be made of straw and displayed in the central square from the first day of Advent. In 37 of those years, the goat has been burned down or damaged by shadowy outsiders, sometimes within a few hours of going up.

programme.title: Fish story
programme.desc: Sometime in the 1980s, Caspar Salmon's grandmother was invited to a gathering on the Welsh island of Anglesey, attended exclusively by people with fish surnames. Or so he says. Thirty years later, film-maker Charlie Lyne attempts to sort myth from reality.

programme.title: Lives Instead of Knives': one woman's struggle to end knife crime
programme.desc: Smith's Farm Estate in Northolt, north-west London, has been the scene of multiple stabbings. After one murder came particularly close to home, community volunteer Jen Lock began a one-woman mission to end knife crime in the area. But, as she finds out, things don't always go smoothly.

programme.title: Death at Sea | Inner-city cricket: The Midlands. Is ethnic minority talent being missed?
programme.desc: Death at sea: Syrian migrants film their perilous voyage to Europe | Inner-city cricket: The Midlands. Is ethnic minority talent being missed?

programme.title: The "Spider-Man" of Sudan: the real-life superhero of the protest movement
programme.desc: In Sudan's capital, Khartoum, an anonymous protester dressed as Spider-Man joins the hundreds of thousands of protesters desperate to protect their fragile civilian government after the military coup in October 2021. 'Spidey' has become well known on social media for leaping from billboards and scaling the tops of buildings while dodging teargas. However, it's his work with some of the poorest children in Khartoum that has shown him to be a positive focus for the resistance, helping a new generation to know their worth and take pride in their country's rich heritage.

programme.title: The Great Abandonment: the extraordinary exodus of India's migrant labourers
programme.desc: In 2020, the Indian prime minister, Narendra Modi, announced one of the harshest Covid lockdowns in the world, causing nearly 200 million migrant labourers to be stranded without wages, food and housing. Many undertook long journeys to return to their home villages, while others, caught in limbo with their families, were forced to wait, living on the street or under the flyovers they had once laboured to build. And as workers' rights eroded, the push for unionisation gathered momentum in the country. Filmed in Mumbai, this documentary reveals the deep divide between those who have and those who do not, while questioning the actions of India's leader

programme.title: Quipu: Calls for Justice
programme.desc: Esperanza and Teodula are calling for justice in rural Peru, part of 300,000 people sterilised without consent more than 18 years ago. The Quipu Project is their phoneline that allows victims across the country to share their shocking testimonies and ensure those responsible are punished.

programme.title: The Battle for Myanmar's Buddhist spirit
programme.desc: In Myanmar, different groups of Buddhist monks are battling with how to deal with the country's minority Muslim population. While some advocate peace, others, such as the extremist Ma Ba Tha, are stoking up hatred and violence. The Guardian visited Myanmar to investigate how the monks' actions are threatening to destabilise the country's newly established democracy

programme.title: Lupita
programme.desc: In a country where indigenous people are increasingly displaced and journalists are killed at an alarming rate, a courageous new voice has emerged: Lupita, a Tzotzil-Maya woman at the forefront of a Mexican indigenous movement. Twenty years after Lupita lost her family in the Acteal massacre in southern Mexico, she has become a spokesperson for her people and for a new generation of Mayan activists.

programme.title: Second innings
programme.desc: From Afghanistan to London, three boys build a new life playing cricket. Tucked away in suburban south London, matches take place every week for young and often traumatised asylum seekers. Many have fled war and have been separated from their families. The Refugee Cricket project, organised by the Refugee Council, provides not only a chance to play and make friends, but also to access advice and support as they navigate the complex asylum system and other challenges in their new home

programme.title: The Legend of Barney Thomson
programme.desc: Comedy drama as Robert Carlyle plays Barney Thomson, a downtrodden barber who has fallen from grace in his meagre barbering life. One day whilst almost losing his job, Barney comically falls into the unthinkable role of a serial killer. As he sweats out his predicament, and attempts to clumsily cover his tracks, a police detective investigating a series of murders in the area begins to suspect Barney may not be all he appears to be. All the while Barney's mother Cemolina cheerfully emasculates her son, setting off a bloody chain of events.

programme.title: I Used To Go Here
programme.desc: I USED TO GO HERE is a fun and quirky coming-of-age story from the producers of Sorry to Bother You, starring Gillian Jacobs (Community) and Jemaine Clement (Flight of the Conchords). Her engagement is called off, her first book isn't doing so well, and all her friends are having babies. Kate Conklin (Jacobs) is in a real rut when out of nowhere she gets a call from her old professor, David Kirkpatrick (Clement), asking her to come back to her old university to do a reading. She gets sucked into college life again, hanging out with students and reconnecting with her old self.

programme.title: The Girl Next Door
programme.desc: Eighteen-year-old Matthew Kidman (Emile Hirsch) is a straight-arrow over-achiever who has never really lived life… until he falls for his new neighbor, the beautiful and seemingly innocent Danielle (Elisha Cuthbert). When Matthew discovers this perfect “girl next door” is a one-time porn star, his sheltered existence begins to spin out of control. Ultimately Danielle helps Matthew emerge from his shell, and discover that sometimes you have to risk everything for the person you love.

programme.title: Basmati Blues
programme.desc: Linda Watt (Brie Larson: Room, 21 Jump Street) is a sheltered but brilliant young scientist who is plucked out of her company's lab and sent to India by her CEO (Donald Sutherland: The Hunger Games) to sell "Rice 9," a genetically modified rice she's created.

programme.title: Golden Years
programme.desc: When Arthur and Martha Goode find that their pension pot is virtually worthless they decide to take drastic action - by robbing a bank! After their first robbery is successful they start to like the criminal lifestyle and so decide to rob even more, but as the banks get bigger and the robberies get riskier will they be able to outwit the police as they close in? In the vein of "Lady In the Van" and "The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel", Golden Years is a hilarious British heist thriller that shows just because you're getting old doesn't mean you have to stop having fun.

programme.title: Where Eskimos Live
programme.desc: Sharkey, part of the sinister world of child trade, picks up Vlado, an orphan of war, dreaming of freedom and a better life. They embark upon a strange and enlightening journey through war torn Bosnia.

programme.title: Cash
programme.desc: A stroke of good luck turns lethal for Sam Phelan and his wife Leslie when they are faced with a life-changing decision that brings strange and sinister Pyke Kubic to their doorstep.

programme.title: New Fist of Fury
programme.desc: A stylish remake of Bruce Lee's original Fist of Fury from the same director (Lo Wei), ‘New Fist of Fury' was a vital landmark in the early career of the legendary Jackie Chan.

programme.title: The Cannonball Run
programme.desc: The classic comedy with cool stars and even cooler cars! Based on a true race event, Burt Reynolds leads an all-star cast in the ultimate quest to win The Cannonball Run.

programme.title: Kickboxer: Vengeance
programme.desc: Kurt Sloane has always been there for his brother, Eric, who's known in the martial arts world as a modern-day warrior. But when the ruthless and undefeated fighter Tong Po brutally ends Eric's life in a no-holds-barred match in Thailand, Kurt devotes himself to training with a master in a quest for redemption... and revenge.

programme.title: Anarchy
programme.desc: A gritty story of a take-no-prisoners war between dirty cops and an outlaw biker gang. A drug kingpin is driven to desperate measures.

programme.title: Hudson
programme.desc: On a journey to scatter his mother's ashes, a reclusive and timid man encounters unexpected friendships and a chance to start living his life.

programme.title: 300 Spartans The Real Story
programme.desc: 300 Spartans-The Real Story. Putting aside the myths and legends, this documentary takes a detailed look at the Battle of Thermopylae in 480 BC Greece leading to the last stand of the 300 Spartans and Spartan King Leonidas. On the 3rd day of the battle, when Leonidas was being surrounded, he sent most of his troops away and covered their retreat with a last stand because Spartans never retreated.

programme.title: Love, Lost & Found
programme.desc: Claire gets a surprise proposal on a mountain hike with her boyfriend Joey but when they get separated, a rancher turns Claire's head and a park ranger makes Joey see they're made for each other.

programme.title: Love Surreal
programme.desc: Abby is a promising art student whose long-term relationship with her perfect—but imaginary—boyfriend Sy is going strong, until fellow student Quinn enters the picture. Trapped into tutoring Quinn, Abby begins to fall for this flawed but flesh-and-blood reality. Now Abby must decide if she's ready for a real chance at love—and if she can let go of Sy.

programme.title: Moving McAllister
programme.desc: Rick Robinson is a ladder-climbing law intern from Miami with four days until the Bar Exam. Desperate to score points with his boss (McAllister), he commits to a favor he can't afford. He ends up in a rundown truck headed to L.A. with his boss's possessions, his Hollywood-bound niece, and her pet pig. Amidst hitch-hikers, breakdowns, and assorted local yokels, Rick finds love, life and maybe himself in this trans-American road trip from hell.

programme.title: Hope Ranch
programme.desc: A young girl has it all—a beautiful ranch, a horse named Faith, and the love of her family. But after the death of her military father, she and her mother are in danger of losing their family ranch too. With a little help from friends and their majestic white horse, they hatch a plan to raise enough money to save the ranch while learning to never lose hope, despite all odds.

programme.title: Our Dream Wedding
programme.desc: Commitment-shy Natalie tries on her grandma's 'magical' wedding veil and is transported to her future, where she and long-term boyfriend Scott are happily married with two beautiful children. Is she finally ready to commit?

programme.title: McLintock!
programme.desc: Wealthy rancher G.W. McLintock uses his power and influence in the territory to keep the peace between farmers, ranchers, land-grabbers, Indians and corrupt government officials.

programme.title: From Hell to Texas
programme.desc: After ranch hand Tod Lohman accidentally kills the son of a powerful rancher, he panics and flees, but the rancher and his vengeful crew hunt Tod down.

programme.title: Ride Lonesome
programme.desc: A bounty hunter escorts a killer to be tried for murder, but allows the man's outlaw brother to catch up with them to have a showdown over a previous shocking murder.

programme.title: Pawnee
programme.desc: Pale Arrow is a white man raised since a boy by the Pawnee Chief. With wagon trains now encroaching on Pawnee land, the Chief sends Pale Arrow to be with the white people.

programme.title: Sweet Home Carolina
programme.desc: Diane is a struggling single mom in LA. Just when things are at their worst, but she will have to live in small town USA for a year and take care of a dog for a year before the house is hers.

programme.title: One Last Dance
programme.desc: In the wake of tragedy, a renowned NY dance company is on the brink of collapse. After leaving the dance world for good, Travis, Chrissa and Max have one last chance to re-connect with the passion and prove that miracles really can happen.

programme.title: Love & Other Drugs
programme.desc: A womanizing Viagra salesman with no sense of direction or responsibility falls in love with a free-spirited woman.

programme.title: Made For You, With Love
programme.desc: The owner of a second hand wedding dress business breathes new life into used dresses, making dreams come true for brides unable to afford pricey gowns. But when she meets the perfect guy, she's afraid to give her own heart a second chance at love.

programme.title: Cinderella Pact
programme.desc: Nola, Deb, and Nancy are best friends who create a Cinderella Pact—a weight loss agreement using advice from "fairy godmother" newspaper columnist Bel.

programme.title: Monster Halloween
programme.desc: With Halloween on the horizon, ShortsTV unleashes hordes of dark, nasty characters on the channel throughout October. Join us every Friday night as we celebrate Monster Halloween with horror shorts featuring monsters of all sizes and natures.

programme.title: Live For Laughs
programme.sub-title: Comedy movies to tickle your funny bone.
programme.desc: From pure slapstick to dark comedy, with our Comedic short movies there is something for everyone.

programme.title: Coming of Age
programme.desc: Growing up isn't easy. Join us for a season of coming of age shorts, delving into the challenging and enlightening period when children grow into adults.

programme.title: Fright Club- Strangers in the Night
programme.desc: Fright Club- Strangers in the Night. Obscured figures and unfamiliar faces to keep you on edge! The Observer Effect (19 mins), Birthday (15 mins), Sick (6 Mins), Body (12 mins)

programme.title: Live For Laughs
programme.sub-title: Comedy movies to tickle your funny bone.
programme.desc: From pure slapstick to dark comedy, with our Comedic short movies there is something for everyone.

programme.title: Family Ties- Family Breaks
programme.desc: Family Ties- Family Breaks. Work on Bonding. Fry Up (8 min), Negative Space (6 min), Getting On (9 min), The Hope Rooms (14 min), Long Distance Information(8 min), A Family Portrait(5 min)

programme.title: Last Girl Standing
programme.desc: Five years ago, a masked killer brutally murdered a group of friends. Since then, Camryn, the lone survivor, has struggled to reclaim her shattered life. She might have survived the brutal massacre but what happens to the final girl after the credits roll?

programme.title: I Know Who Killed Me
programme.desc: An idyllic small town is rocked when Aubrey Fleming, a bright and promising young college student is abducted and tortured by a sadistic serial killer.

programme.title: Romance Retreat
programme.desc: After a big breakup, journalist Dana Willingham finds herself alone and stuck at a couple's yoga retreat while the biggest story of her career breaks far away. And she doesn't even like yoga! But maybe the universe has put her here for a reason, because the handsome loner staying at the lodge turns out to be Stefan Gonzales, the tech guru at the center of the scandal. As she gains his trust to expose him, she finds herself falling in love with him. Now she must use the lessons from yoga to choose: the perfect story or the perfect man?

programme.title: Detective McLean
programme.desc: Allison and Devin investigate the breakdown of a star student at the high school and the teens deal with the social fallout of having Allison on campus.

programme.title: Unknown Energies, Unidentified Emotions
programme.desc: A Foundation reporter, Isidor Dukas comes to the Institute to make a report. For the purpose of objective reporting, the Foundation uses agents with induced, synthetic identities. In confrontation with one of the test subjects, what was supposed to be a r

programme.title: Keepsake
programme.desc: Janine is a young woman on the road to a new life when a freak accident strands her on a deserted highway and a call for help soon becomes a fight for survival. Stalked and tormented by a psychotic tow truck driver, Janine soon finds herself trapped in a world of torture and depravity, imprisoned in a cellar and given only thirty days to live! Janine must contend with both the ghosts of her past and the demons of her present in an effort to survive.

programme.title: Chain Letter
programme.desc: Six friends receive a mysterious chain letter via text and email from a maniac who hunts down those who delete the message. Who knew they should take the threats in the chain letter seriously or that their favorite technologies could help track and kill them?

programme.title: Father
programme.desc: When did you last talk with your father? Will you ever ask him about those things that hurt you? In Father the reality of life is turned upside down to create an impossible dialogue - the dialogue between a child and a father that never happens.

programme.title: Unfinished Business
programme.desc: A hard-working small business owner and his two associates travel to Europe to close the most important deal of their lives. But what began as a routine business trip goes off the rails in every way imaginable, and unimaginable.

programme.title: Whats Eating Gilbert Grape
programme.desc: Gilbert feels trapped - with no father present and an eccentric family to care for, he is struggling to cope. Despite the hardships Gilbert perseveres, but will he be able to live his own life?

programme.title: Under Suspicion
programme.desc: From Emmy award winning director Stephen Hopkins and the producers of Fight Club, we follow a wealthy attorney who is accused of the murder of a young girl. Starring: Morgan Freeman, Gene Hackman, Thomas Jane

programme.title: The Romantics
programme.desc: Oscar winner Anna Paquin and Katie Holmes prove nothing complicates love like friendship in this zeitgeist love story.

programme.title: Intimate Stranger
programme.desc: Karen, the beautiful single mother of precious 9-year-old Justin, never really had much luck with love. This all seems to change when she falls for her “Prince Charming”, Dennis, who is both a caring gentleman and a great friend to her son. But her perfect world begins to crumble when she finds a black rose on her doorstep, hears noises in the attic and gets prank calls in the middle of the night. After breaking up with Dennis her life begins to turn upside down and strange things start happening. Questioning her own sanity and left alone by authorities, friends and family, she decides to take matters into her own hands- a dangerous decision that puts her life on the line…

programme.title: Love Again
programme.desc: A distant father (Kevin Sorbo) and a lost girlfriend to his best friend (Ben Davies) leads Nathan (Jason Burkey) on a journey of rediscovery.

programme.title: Hometown Hero
programme.desc: Young divorce lawyer Kelsey finds it safer to keep love out of her life - that is until a stray dog pairs her with Harrison, the local vet.

programme.title: Love on the Vines

programme.title: Tennessee Williams' The Roman Spring of Mrs. Stone
programme.desc: After moving to Rome, a lonely widow finds herself consumed by a destructive love for a young Italian man in this adaptation of Tennessee Williams' haunting novella.

programme.title: Smart People
programme.desc: A widowed professor (Dennis Quaid) experiences a new love and an unexpected visit from his adopted brother.

programme.title: Granada Nights
programme.desc: A British tourist is stuck in Granada, Spain with a broken heart. Feeling lost and abandoned, he befriends a group of young foreigners and crashes into the heart of the international student scene. He pushes himself out of his comfort-zone and tries to restart his life but behind every corner is a reminder of his ex-girlfriend and his struggle to find closure. A love letter to Granada that mixes documentary with fiction to create a real and authentic heartfelt examination on the process of self-discovery.

UN Command's Supreme Commander General MacArthur plans a covert landing operation, which has a success chance of 5,000:1.

programme.title: Bloodthirsty

programme.title: Xmoor
programme.desc: When the hunters become the hunted. In a bid to catch sight of a mysterious killer beast, documentary-makers Georgia and Matt, along with animal expert Fox, head out onto the dark terrain of Exmoor. But when they encounter a series of corpses, they know they are caught in the clutches of something much worse. This hair-raising creature feature, brings a sinister twist to the table.

programme.title: A Young Man with High Potential
programme.desc: This shocking, controversial horror thriller sees an uptight man succumb to his inner desires. Piet is a socially awkward, lonely and reclusive student, who catches up on classes online. This changes when he is forced to partner a project with new student Klara. Soon he becomes fixated with her. After his advances are rebuffed, he starts down a dark and despicable path.

Loan sharks, side hustles and a lot of fun along the way, this car salesman soon discovers an old dog can learn new tricks.

programme.title: I Am Woman
programme.desc: The story of Helen Reddy, who in 1966 landed in NYC with her three-year-old daughter, a suitcase and $230 in her pocket. Within five years she was one of the biggest superstars of her time, and an icon of the 1970s feminist movement.

programme.title: Karate-do: The Path of Sandra Sánchez
programme.desc: She is not a dragon, though in the dojo you'd swear otherwise. This is Sandra Sánchez, and she's going down in history as one of the greatest karate has ever seen. This is the story of her unique path. Her 'Do'. A winding story of playing at karate as a child, to navigating an abusive relationship as an adult, and concluding in her unbelieveable and record-smashing penultimate year competing in the three most prestigious karate championships, and winning all three. Success is never an easy path, but at the Tokyo Olympics Sandra fought for - and against - many struggles, as she claimed her place in history.

programme.title: Emperor
programme.desc: EMPEROR is a gripping tale of love and honour forged between fierce enemies of war, a story inspired by true events, of the bold and secret moves that won peace in the shadows of postwar Japan. Matthew Fox,Tommy Lee Jones in the iconic role of General Douglas MacArthur, newcomer Eriko Hatsune and Toshiyuki Nishida bring to life the American occupation of Japan in the perilous and unpredictable days just after Emperor Hirohito's World War II surrender.

programme.title: Where hands touch
programme.desc: In 1944, a 15-year-old girl, daughter of a white German mother and a black African father, meets a member of the Hitler Youth. They become bound by the realization of the horrors being committed around them.

programme.title: Ask Me Anything
programme.desc: Beautiful, wild, funny, and lost, Katie Kampenfelt takes a year off before college to find herself, all the while chronicling her adventures in an anonymous blog into which she pours her innermost secrets. Eventually, Katie's fearless narrative begins to crack, and dark pieces of her past emerge.

programme.title: Living is easy with eyes closed
programme.desc: In 1966, John Lennon arrives in Almería to shoot a movie, How I Won the War. Antonio (Javier Cámara, Talk to Her, I'm So Excited!) who teaches English in a small public school by using lyrics from Beatles songs, decides to undertake a journey to meet his idol. During his travels he is joined by Belén (Natalia de Molina), a 20-year-old pregnant girl, and Juanjo (Francesc Colomer), a teenage boy fleeing an overbearing father. The three strike up an unforgettable friendship. Also featuring Ariadna Gil (Pan's Labyrinth), Living Is Easy with Eyes Closed is a must for any Beatles fan.

programme.title: A Perfect Day
programme.desc: It's just another day on the job for a band of renegade rescue workers as they defy death in the middle of a war zone. Somewhere in the Balkans, over the course of 24 breathless hours, Mambrú (Benicio del Toro), leads his team of humanitarians, including hard-bitten, wisecracking veteran B (Tim Robbins) and new recruit Sophie (Melanie Thierry), as they deal with an unexpected crisis. Through it all, the group handles the less-than-glamorous realities of life in a combat zone the only way they know how: with selfless bravery and a healthy dose of irreverent humour. From the director of ‘Loving Pablo' and ‘The Good Boss'.

programme.title: Mythica: The Dragon Slayer
programme.desc: As the Lich King's zombie legions ravage the world, Marek, a cursed young sorceress, embarks on a quest to obtain a weapon from the gods, with her friend Dagen, a self-serving half-elf rogue. But when she joins her sworn enemy in a desperate attempt to save the world, she must recover the good in herself before her friends are all dead, and defeat the Lich King before the gods are destroyed and the world forever enslaved.

programme.title: Danger Close
programme.desc: Outnumbered, outgunned, never out of courage - 'Danger Close: The Battle of Long Tan' is an exhilarating and hard-hitting war thriller based on the unbelievable true story of The Battle of Long Tan. Major Harry Smith (Travis Fimmel) and his company of 108 young and inexperienced Australian and New Zealand soldiers are fighting for their lives in the Battle of Long Tan. With 2,500 battle-hardened Viet Cong soldiers closing in, their ammunition running out and casualties mounting, each man searches for the strength to triumph over an uncertain future with honour, decency and courage.

programme.title: Surrounded
programme.desc: The Shallows meets Jaws in this gripping, pulse-pounding shark thriller. To boost viewership of their popular travel vlog, a group of millennial friends document their illegal snorkelling trip to a beautiful cove. However, they are left fighting for their lives when their plane crashes and they are attacked by a pack of great white sharks. A nail-biting survival thriller with one hell of a bite…

programme.title: Encounter

But with the government on their tail, time is running out to ascertain the alien's true intentions.

programme.title: I Do... Let's Eat!
programme.desc: Jill is 29 and works for a financial services company. Alain is 27 and a marine mechanic. He owns ‘Offshore Obsessions', a marina that specializes in offshore powerboats. Jill says, ‘it was like a movie. We were in Central Park and it started to rain and he got down on one knee … I was totally shocked!'

programme.title: I Do... Let's Eat!
programme.desc: Fanny and Martin are two 29-year-olds from Quebec who live together in the small city of Chateauguay, south of Montreal. Fanny works in marketing while Martin works as a computer programmer. Fanny also has a 7-year-old son, Alexy, who lives with them. The couple met three years ago on the Internet and last Christmas, Martin surprised Fanny by proposing in front of both of their families. In lieu of a present, he got down on one knee and asked for her hand in marriage. ‘She was very emotional and started crying,' Martin says. ‘But she said yes!'

programme.title: I Do... Let's Eat!

programme.title: I Do... Let's Eat!
programme.desc: “When it comes to planning this wedding, I'm a bridezilla.” says Tammy with a grin. “Jake is lucky if he has any say at all.” Tammy and Jake, both 30 years old, have been together for over a decade, and live together with Tammy's 12 year old son Dillon. But they've known each other since childhood. Tammy and Jake both grew up in Picton, and their wedding is a first for both families. Tammy says she was immediately intrigued with Jake because his family lived on their own exotic animal sanctuary. “It's not often you have a crush on someone who grew up with lions, tigers and jaguars,” says Tammy. “I was hooked early.”

programme.title: I Do... Let's Eat!
programme.desc: Heather is a 38-year-old hair stylist who lives in Vancouver with David, a 36-year-old who owns a roofing company. The couple's courtship has been longer than most: they met 14 years ago and have been engaged for 5 years. Along the way, there have been several twists and turns in their relationship. Heather and David were both born and raised in Edmonton but didn't cross paths until they ended up on the same bus trip to Calgary for a football game. They dated for several months, and even moved to Vancouver together, but Heather wasn't ready to settle down. She wanted to see the world and so while David stayed in Vancouver, she spent four years working on a cruise ship.

programme.title: I Do... Let's Eat!
programme.desc: Karla is 27 years old and works as an assistant in a medical office. Two years ago, she began dating Louie, a 32-year-old investment salesman. This has been a busy summer for Karla and Louie, who recently moved from Vancouver to Toronto – while also planning their wedding. But the couple takes it all in stride. “Nowadays, you see people taking on a second mortgage to pay for their wedding because they go all out,” says Louie. “It shouldn't be like that. It should be about the two people who are in love – not the limo or the dress.” Karla nods in agreement. “Our emphasis is on family and friends and surrounding ourselves with people we love for our special day.”

programme.sub-title: Gameplay Walkthrough Part 1 - Prologue and Three Chapters

programme.title: The LEGO Technic Bugatti Chiron Podcast
programme.desc: Listen as Etienne Salome, Head of Interior Design at Bugatti explains the special challenge of marrying luxurious comfort with state-of-the-art performance in a car like the Bugatti Chiron. For LEGO Technic designer Aurelien Rouffiange, trying to recreate the soft lines and materials of the Chiron's interior in hard LEGO Technic elements was one of the most challenging tasks he faced while working on the model.

programme.title: LEGO Friends Full Episodes 11-20
programme.sub-title: Girls Cartoons For Children In English
programme.desc: Full episodes compilation of LEGO Friends season 3 with episodes 11 to 20 of this fun girls cartoons for children in English. Join the fun adventures of Emma, Olivia, Stephanie, Andrea and Mia in Heartlake City in this girls movies for kids and teenagers.

programme.title: Legacy, Vehicle and Mechs
programme.desc: Zane takes help from Nya for backup memories of their adventures to the Samurai X Cave computer, but Zane encounters a mysterious puzzle buried deep within his code. Nya digitizes Jay and uploads him into Zane's mind. Jay reviews memories of the Ninja's various motorcycles, mechs and planes in order to solve the vehicle-themed puzzle.

programme.title: The Good, The Bad And The Tightwad
programme.desc: Clay wakes up in the poor town of Nothing Hill which literally have nothing. Will Clay remember who he is and what he is fighting for. His friends try to help him, but Jorah Tightwad and his Bots get in the way. Clay as the Gray Knight wakes up far away in a place called Nothing Hill. A poor town where they literally have nothing. They harvest dust. Jorah Tightwad though has found that there is gold underneath the town. He convinces the confused Clay to help him put pressure on the poor townsfolk to give up their lots. This is an easy job for the strong Gray Knight. The NEXO KNIGHTS finally track him down and tries to convince him about who he is. But to the Gray Knight they are still his enemies, and a giant battle ensues in order to subdue the Gray Knight. At last, only Macy is left. When she begins to recite the Knights Code, some words and their meaning are able to get through the stone hard shell of the Gray Knight and the Evil that clouded him seems to disappear. Together they are able to return the ownership of the town to the villagers.

programme.title: The Book Of Monsters, Part 1
programme.desc: When Jestro the Jester finds the Book of Monsters, chaos breaks loose in the Kingdom of Knighton. Can the newly graduated Knights from the Knights' Academy save the kingdom? It's final graduation fighting exams for the latest Knights from Knights' Academy. All our new Knights demonstrate their prowess: CLAY, AARON, AXL and LANCE. PRINCESS MACY get to join them, but her father doesn't want her to graduate. As part of the entertainment, MERLOK does an amazing magic trick. His act is followed by…JESTRO, the King's Jester. He's terrible (and he should know to never follow a better act.) Everyone laughed because he's a real joke....a total failure. While Jestro roams the halls fo the King's Castle, forlorn, he hears the BOOK OF MONSTERS calling to him from Merlok's library. The book talks Jestro into gathering as many books of spells as he can carry, but they're interrupted by...Clay! As Jestro quickly pages through the Book of Monsters to attack Clay, Merlok arrives. There's a battle in the library between Jestro and Merlok. Finally, the wizard summons up his most powerful spell in self-defence. BOOM! There's a big, magical explosion and when Clay forces his way back into the library, Merlok, Jestro and the magic books are...GONE!

programme.title: The Book Of Monsters, Part 2
programme.desc: Realizing they must defend the Kingdom from Jestro's monsters, the Knights try to organize but are despondent when they discover their best advisor – Merlok the Magician – has sacrificed himself to save them. When Jestro awakens, he's been blasted miles and miles away from the King's Castle by Merlok's explosive spell. And, it seems, all the books he was trying to steal have been scattered, too. The Book of Monsters broke Jestro' fall and now he can use the book to attack the people who laughed at him. Meanwhile, the King and his newly-trained Knights pick through the rubble of Merlok's library. They'll have to figure something out, because Jestro and his newly made magic monsters attack King's Castle! Clay organizes the Knights to defend the kingdom, but they've never worked together before. It takes all their training, plus the help of an old friend…MERLOK! Only now he's MERLOK 2.0. Ava has been piecing together what happened and discovering that the “ghost in the machine” she's been chasing is really Merlok in digital form. Now, he can use his magic digitally and he downloads just the right weapons to the struggling Knights! They finally foil Jestro's attack with Merlok's help and officially become NEXO KNIGHTS!

programme.title: The Power Of Merlok
programme.desc: When Jestro attacks a village on the far side of the Kingdom, the NEXO-Knights wonder how they'll get there. Then Macy remembers her dad has a royal RV…maybe they can “mod” that for their own, “knightly” use? Now the NEXO-Knights get rolling…in THE FORTREX, their own ROLLING CASTLE! This great new HQ, which houses Merlok 2.0 as an operating system, will be how the knights move around Knighton and protect it from Jestro and his monsters. Speaking of the evil jester, in this episode Jestro uses some newly-made monsters to attack a town far from the capitol where he thinks he's safe from the Knights' reach. We see two parallel stories here: the Knights training, learning more about digital magic and getting organized as a team and at the same time we see Jestro making monsters, trying to learn how his powers work and talking to the Book. In the end, the Knights roll up in their castle and defeat Jestro and his marauding monsters. Lance thinks he should be the leader because he's a snot. “Of course I'm the leader…I'm a Richmond.”

programme.title: The Knights Code
programme.desc: Jestro uses the Book of Chaos to unleash, um, chaos and attack the King's hover train to try and kidnap the royal party. Can the NEXO-Knights bring order out of the chaos and save the King? Jestro finds the Book of Chaos in the countryside and decides he must feed it to the book. The Book of Monsters actually tells Jestro NOT to feed it to him he tells Jestro he's not ready for that kind of power. But Jestro doesn't listen. Now the Book unleashes chaotic monsters and Jestro uses them to attack the King and his party who are on a business-related tour of the kingdom. When the NEXO-Knights show up to stop the monster attacks and realize that they must save King and Queen Halbert – Macy's parents – from the chaotic evil monsters that have been unleashed. Clay asserts himself as leader and brings order to the knights from the chaos. He has his own book: the Book of the Knight's Code. They should all live by it.

programme.title: The Hatching
programme.desc: The Ninja learn more about the Krux and Acronix – the two fallen Elemental Masters known as the Hands of Time – and are sure that this threat has finally been eliminated. But with Wu out of action and suffering from the effects of the Time Punch, the Ninja discover a new enemy in their midst: The Vermillion Warriors. And the Ninjas have no idea who controls them...

programme.title: A Time Of Traitors
programme.desc: Kai's investigation of a Vermillion Warrior Helmet leads him to discover that Krux is alive and well in Ninjago, living under an assumed identity. Meanwhile, as the Vermillion Warriors go on a kidnapping spree, Lloyd struggles with his role as master-in-training and Nya does her best to reboot Zane, who was knocked off line in his first battle with the Vermillion.

programme.title: The Mask Of Deception
programme.desc: When an unknown criminal syndicate threatens the Royal Family, the Ninja are called back into action and must protect the royal princess and a fabled artifact that may hold supernatural powers. The ninja find themselves scattered to the four corners of the kingdom. Cole and Jay are searching in vain for some sign of Master Wu. Nya fights injustice in the north, while Kai and Zane attempt to fend off an angry lava beast in the west. This leaves Lloyd alone in Ninjago City. He rushes to the scene of a heist at Borg Tower and finds himself up against a team of highly trained operatives led by the mysterious masked MISTER-E. Lloyd fails to prevent the heist and an ancient artifact, the MASK OF DECEPTION, is stolen. Lloyd apprehends one of the criminals but the others escape. Dismayed by his failure, Lloyd calls the ninjas back to Ninjago. The friends are reunited and hope for a little rest and relaxation. These hopes are dashed with the arrival MASTER HUTCHINS, a servant of the Royal Family of Ninjago, who has been sent by the EMPEROR to request their help. A new criminal gang, SONS OF GARMADON (SOG), is attempting to acquire three ancient masks called the ONI MASKS, which are rumored to possess supernatural powers.

programme.title: The Jade Princess
programme.desc: In the wake of an assassination attempt targeting the royal family, the ninja invite the royal princess, HARUMI, into their makeshift family. Lloyd glimpses someone escaping over the rooftops with a sack on their back. Fearing it is the kidnapped princess, Lloyd takes up the chase! He discovers to his surprise, however, that the masked intruder is none other than the princess herself, who is not quite as docile or meek as she pretends. She has a habit of sneaking out of her chambers at night to feed the homeless who surround the Imperial Palace. This revelation only endears her to Lloyd more and Harumi and Lloyd quickly strike up a friendship. Unfortunately, trouble catches up to the ninja when the Sons Of Garmadon target the second Oni mask and attack the palace. The scope of the attack proves more than the Ninja were prepared for as the Sons of Garmadon detonate a series of subterranean bombs, bringing down part of the palace. Lloyd and Harumi escape onto the flying ship, DESTINY'S BOUNTY. But the victory is a pyrrhic one. The second Oni Mask has been stolen and Harumi's parents and Master Hutchins are feared lost.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Secret Of Shadow Swamp: Grouchy, the Smurf who hates everything, doubly hates his own birthday party and goes to hide in Shadow Swamp... He is going to meet strange beings and stranger adventures while the other Smurfs search for him...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Flighty's Plight: Flighty Smurf, as his name implies, can't make his own mind up about anything. The other Smurfs take him to the forest for a survival test in which he can find his way home only by making decisions. He ends up in Balthazar's castle.

programme.title: Beauty Is Only Smurf Deep
programme.desc: Periwinkle, a vain Pixie, is upset when her magic mirror tells her that Vanity is the fairest, not she. Periwinkle kidnaps Vanity, but the rest of the Smurfs come to Vanity's rescue. Periwinkle sees the error of her ways and they become friends.

programme.title: Harmony Steals The Show
programme.desc: Harmony unwittingly signs a contract with Ghost Writer for a symphony that imprisons him in a ghostly nightclub for life! Papa Smurf demands a jury trial with ghostly jurors and a judge that finds Harmony innocent and Ghost Writer guilty of plagiarism.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Papa Smurf, Papa Smurf: Yes, there can be too much of a good thing. When an accident happens to Papa Smurf's magic formula and he ends up multiplied by two, the Smurfs are elated: two Papa Smurfs can give twice the good counsel and twice the loving that one can. But after a while, things get too complex in the Village. Especially when another accident doubles the number of Gargamels!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Incredible Shrinking Wizard: Gargamel has thrown in his slime pond so much poisonous muck that the water becomes enchanted and Gargamel, after falling in, suddenly finds himself much smaller that he would wish. Actually he is going to be so small that Papa Smurf will save him!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurfette's Dancing Shoes: An evil imp gives Smurfette dancing shoes and then tricks her into promising to marry him. All her little friends rush to her rescue and Papa Smurf magically puts the dancing shoes on the imp. He is forced to dance off into the night.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Jokey's Cloak: What is in the box that's been found by Jokey Smurf? A cloak belonging to Wizlow the Magician gnome. And what sort of cloak? Jokey learns that it's a cloak of invisibility. Whoever wears it has a great opportunity of playing practical jokes... And guess what havoc an invisible Jokey is able to wreak on the Village. Yet if Wizlow parted with the cloak, there must be a reason...

programme.title: All The News That's Fit To Smurf
programme.desc: Curious Smurf has an idea: why not print a sheet with all the Village news? He's sure to interest all his readers of the Smurf Tattler. But things don't go exactly to plan when Papa finds super smurfberries.

programme.title: Master Scruple
programme.desc: Farmer Smurf is the reluctant master of a genie named Gourdy, whose enthusiasm for service is somewhat excessive. After yet another incident due to Gourdy's overzealousness, Farmer Smurf says something he shouldn't and Gourdy disappears. And guess who finds him? Well, it's Scruple, apprentice to the evil wizard Gargamel. And who should steal Gourdy from Scruple, if not Gargamel himself?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Papa's Worrywarts: Papa Smurf's worries make him break into a rash of worrywarts. The only way to relieve him of his bout of indecision-inducing disease is to have him rub the horn of a Wartmonger, a sloppy, slimy, stupid and brutal enemy of the Pussywillow Pixies...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Jokey's Funny Bone: Jealous of the attention Vanity Smurf receives when he breaks his toe, Jokey Smurf feigns sickness in hopes of getting recognition. Unfortunately, his ploy turns against him and instead of loving care all he receives is the proverbial pound of curse.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Sky Is Smurfing: Scaredy Smurf runs into the Village screaming about the sky being about to smurf down. And just at the same moment, Papa Smurf is beset by uncontrollable fits of sneezing...

programme.title: Spelunking Smurfs
programme.desc: The starving Smurfs discover a cave that has a stash of frozen food inside guarded by an equally frozen troll who was imprisoned because of his greed by a magic diamond. As the Smurfs defrost the cave, Gargamel steals the food, but the magic diamond transforms him into an icy mass and the freed troll happily helps the Smurfs carry the food back to their village.

programme.title: Smurfette's Sweet Tooth
programme.desc: Once a year, Greedy Smurf makes a special batch of Smurfberry candy. Every Smurf receives a whole year's provision of the smurfiest candy in the whole world. But can a Smurf keep his provision for a whole year? Can the Smurfette?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurf On Wood: The evil wizard Gargamel once again meets Esmeralda, the gypsy fortune-teller, and she finds a novel way of getting the gold coin that Gargamel imprudently shows her. But the Smurfs in their turn are tricked into believing there is such a thing as a good-luck tree...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Once In A Blue Moon: Once in a blue moon, as the legend goes, a baby Smurf is delivered to the Smurfs and everyone in the village becomes attached to the new arrival. But a mistake has been made and the stork returns to take the baby back. Grouchy and Smurfette have become so attached to the baby that the baby is returned.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Littlest Viking: The Smurfs take Grandpa Smurf to the King's castle so that he can meet Peewit. But what with one thing and another (especially another), the Smurfs and Peewit are taken aboard a Viking long ship. The Vikings take Peewit to be their mythical Great Warrior, the one who is going to vanquish the Storm King. Can the Smurfs help Peewit out of his quandary?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Most Popular Smurf: Jokey's surprise exploding packages have been changed by a spell. Picture the practical joker's discombobulating when he realises that all the surprises that he hands to unsuspecting Smurfs contain nothing but real gifts! No more ka-boom, no more jokes, no more fun! Plus the unenviable new position of Most Popular Smurf in the Village, surrounded by admirers begging for more presents...

programme.title: Scruple's Sweetheart
programme.desc: Brenda, the little witch, feels rejected: no-one is taking her to this year's Broomstick Ball. Oh, if she could find some nice-looking boy... Then she meets Scruple, apprentice of the evil wizard Gargamel. He's so handsome, and available too! What she does not know is that Scruple's only interest is her magic wand. What the Smurfs know is that they're going to save the day.

programme.title: Monkey Safari
programme.desc: Today in Teletubbyland, the Teletubbies have special things to do. Andy Brown and some children drive through a safari park to see some monkeys.

programme.title: Mum's Keyboard

programme.desc: The Teletubbies watch a little girl whose Mum has a very special job. Po has too much Tubby Custard and Tubby Custard Tummy and there's time foe one more dance before Tubby Bye-Bye.

programme.title: Grassroots: The Cannabis Revolution
programme.desc: Clark French is 30 years old and has Multiple Sclerosis. Every day he battles, against the debilitating nature of his illness, but also against social stigma and the law. He doesn't treat his MS with conventional medication he self-medicates illegally, with cannabis. A hunger for helping similarly afflicted people birthed a need to fight for a change to the law that prevents access to cannabis. We follow Clark and other campaigners to protests battling on the front lines up and down the UK.

Re-telling the tragedy, the film presents the protests against their release from an institution, delves into the backgrounds of the killers, their terrible violent act and the impact it caused in UK. It also explores claims that their punishment has been a sham, as reporter Deborah Davies investigates how inmates at secure units are treated and interviews experts to learn whether eight years has been sufficient time to successfully rehabilitate the pair.

programme.title: Epic Safari Encounters
programme.desc: Kristina travels to Gonarezhou National Park in the South-East of Zimbabwe. Thomas, her guide, takes her to the breath-taking Chilojo cliffs, tracks an impressive buffalo herd and keeps his cool as they experience heart-stopping elephant charges. Will Kristina finally spot her dream leopard?

programme.title: Wildest Survival
programme.desc: Enter the world of nocturnal animals... Living your life at night can present extreme challenges - and massive opportunities. In this world without light, danger lurks around every corner. This episode takes us into a world we can barely see - but for many animals it is all they know. Primates like owls, hyenas with super senses and insects that glow have evolved to succeed in this world without light. Whether it's finding food, searching for a mate, or battling off predators, in this murky world only the strongest - and smartest - will survive. In the jungles of Madagascar a secretive relative of the hedgehog communicates through noises produced by it's spines. On the dusty plains of southern Africa a fierce trio of honey badgers fends off a ravenous hyena. Deep in a cave in an isolated part of New Zealand an underground lightshow is produced by millions of tiny insects. And on the coast of Chile, a bat emerges from it's roost. It's time to eateat - and it only feeds on blood... These are just some of the species featured in the third episode. As darkness descends these nocturnal animals have found their own place in a world without light. They've adapted to life in the dark, from finding a mate, to overcoming life's biggest challenges, these creatures have developed some extraordinary skills. They've found their own way to survive - and thrive - when the sun goes down Even when facing seemingly impossible odds animals can still win their fight for survival.

programme.title: Wildest Survival
programme.desc: Meet the creatures uniquely adapted to life in the deep freeze. Animals have evolved to live on every corner of the planet - but none are as resilient as those who live in the coldest climes. We'll reveal the surprising adaptations earth's cold weather creatures have evolved to survive. This episode takes us to lands of freezing temperatures, scarce food and shortened daylight hours. Flourishing amidst ice and snow is one of nature's extreme challenges. At the southern tip of Chile we follow a lost Puma as she searches for her mother in a blizzard. In Finland a brown bear desperately searches for his last meal before entering hibernation for the approaching long, cold winter. In the vast national park of Yellowstone, a pack of wolves hound a herd of elk through the deep snow. And in the Carpathian Mountains of Romania, a Lynx uses his incredible eyesight to track down and kill even the smallest prey. For all animals winter brings unique challenges. But nature's toughest creatures have found incredible ways to survive in our planets coldest regions. Whether it's finding food, impressing a mate, or avoiding the worst of the weather these animals have evolved remarkable adaptations to outsmart the cold and succeed in the relentless struggle to survive.

programme.title: Polar Bear Family
programme.desc: The ultimate icons of polar wilderness, able to withstand the harshest environments and remain a top predator the lives of polar bears are nothing short of remarkable!

programme.title: Brazil: A Natural History
programme.desc: The largest rainforest in the world still holds many secrets. The harpy eagle is the world's biggest bird of prey, capable of hunting and killing monkeys. But the most important creatures in the forest are leaf-cutter ants ? they can harvest the green wealth of the forest, as they have found a way of removing the protective poisons from the leaves.

programme.title: The Incredible Five
programme.desc: Cheetahs are the high-speed hunters of the Savannah. Few attempt to take on larger prey than gazelles or smallish antelopes. But on occasion, the predatory cats reveal their surprisingly different side. In the Northern Serengeti, a group of male cheetahs emerges and turns all we know about them upside down. Males are usually loners or live in small groups, but here we have five tomcats hunting together as one. It is actually, the largest alliance of the animals ever seen! This film has many stories to tell about the sleek hunters.

programme.title: The Moose Detective
programme.desc: Moose are an iconic species and of great importance to Sweden. That is why the country counts on a very special expert - the moose detective. Recently, a problem has developed on Öland regarding its moose. For a few years now on the island, the moose calves have been dying shortly after birth. It's a mystery. Every effort is made to save them. The island has called upon the moose detective to investigate. He follows several leads. Soon one of the suspects is identified - climate change. But it is not easy to convict the culprit. There are other suspects as well, the food shortage for example. Maybe they have joined hands as accomplices. In Sweden moose are very important. They are game and a magnet for tourists, but they also present a huge danger to traffic and the forestry itself. Equipped with a full team and a lot of high tech devices Fredrik investigates into the habits of moose to protect the population and to keep the potential of conflicts between moose and men as small as possible, all the way from the arctic circle to the island of Öland in southern Sweden. The award winning filmmaker Heiko De Groot tells a crime story with strong and emotional pictures. The scientist becomes a detective who follows his leads and leans from a helicopter with his dart gun like James Bond. It is a thrilling story about the king of the forest.

programme.title: The Original Fight Club: Animal Fights Caught on Camera
programme.desc: There are many reasons for animals to fight and each have their own weapons and rules of combat. They rarely fight without good reason: usually to defend a patch, secure a meal or to attract a mate. With so many reasons for warfare, life can be a never ending battle – for all creatures no matter how great or small, life is a struggle – but they endure – perhaps because there is a fighter in us all …

programme.title: Mantises
programme.desc: They are killers. They kill with unbelievable precision. They fight Kung Fu style and are seen in Japan as a symbol of vigilance - the mantises. Their triangular head with its unique flexibility is conspicuous. Two overdimensioned eyes fixate the distance to their prey rapidly and three-dimensionally. The chest segment of the mantis is prolonged and equipped with spiny appendages that can spear their prey as fast as a jack knife. The mysterious aura that surrounds the praying mantis has a lot to do with the fact that they are rarely seen. They have adapted to their surroundings perfectly. No matter whether leaves, blossoms, tree bark, sandy floors or even orchids - the mantis adjusts to all environments.

programme.title: Predators of a Different Kind
programme.sub-title: In the World of the Unknown Sharks
programme.desc: With the aid of modern technology, reveal the unknown behaviour of some unusual species of shark: lemon sharks and their white-tip reef counterparts. Our film trip begins on the Bahamas. To be more precise: in the turquoise-blue waters of the Grand Bahama Bank, in an exactly fixed location. In the spring, 70 – 80 pregnant lemon sharks arrive here. This huge shark population was first discovered just a few years ago by shark researcher, Professor Sam Gruber. Many of the females are tired and rest on the seabed. Pregnant tiger sharks swim in the midst of this group. Without any protection whatsoever, our cameramen shoot their footage, surrounded by sharks and succeed in capturing images hitherto unseen. We continue our journey to Gainesville, Florida, to meet Gordon Hubbell, the leading shark denture expert with the world's largest shark denture collection. He knows everything about the evolutionary history of the lemon sharks, in addition to those of the white-tip reef variety off Cocos Island, Costa Rica. Here, we encounter large schools of fish, unprecedented numbers of stingrays, as well as hammerhead sharks. However, it is the white-tip reek sharks that make the biggest impression. Their performance begins late at night. Marauding, they patrol in large groups through the reefs and hunt everything that moves. Scales and dead prey fish float above the reef – a welcoming change of diet for the ubiquitous barracudas.

programme.title: Germany's Mystic Forest
programme.desc: 2.000 rivers and streams dig deep into the underground and transport their water into reservoirs or "Germany's Wild Amazon", the Wupper. These forests and rivers, together with heathlands and moors, are home to a diverse fauna. Martens, badgers, wild boars, hares, roe deer, and red deer, even black grouse and hazel deer find shelter in these parts. Wolves also have a dominant presence, not to mention those who live underground, such as lizards, bats, and snakes. Accompany us on a journey where we explore every corner of this rugged land. Climb underground into the Bergisches Land, through the vast hidden cave systems that sprawl far beneath the forests. There is also much to be discovered in the water, dive with us in crystal clear streams and rivers with their diverse flora and fauna.

programme.title: SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 14, Romania
programme.desc: In this episode, a final chance for our athletes to get vital world series ranking points on board to give them the best possible chance of success and an initial advantage at the finals. programme.title: SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 15, World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: We are in Alanya, on Turkeys south-coast for the final stop at the end of a mammoth season. Here in the sunshine, well finally crown our world champion and what a place Alanya is - you could not ask for a better setting. Aivars Smaukstellis, the reigning world champion is defending his title, and two-time world champion Dainis Zageris is also here, but with a though competition, who will win?

programme.title: SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 16, World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: What a day ahead of us here in Alanya, just a handful of events to go before we find out who will be the winner of Strongman Champions League in 2021. These are the world finals, and all the big names are in the house. With just 3 events to go - who will take the crown of World Champion 2021 and be the STRONGEST?
